image: Max. Image Resolution: 2048 x 1536 Frame Rate: 50Hz: 25fps(1920 × 1080) 25fps (1280 × 960), 25fps (1280 × 720) 60Hz: 30fps (1920 × 1080) 30fps (1280 × 960), 30fps (1280 × 720) Third Stream: Independent setting, up to: 50Hz: 20fps (2048 x 1536), 60Hz: 20fps (2048 x 1536) Image Settings: Rotate mode, Saturation, Brightness, Contrast adjustable by client software or web browser BLC: Support Defog: Support EIS: Support ROI: Yes, up to 4 configurable areas Picture Overlay: 128 × 128, BMP 24bit, zone configurable
general: Operating Conditions: -30 °C ~ 60 °C (-22 °F ~ 140 °F) Humidity 95% or less (non-condensing) Power Supply: 24 VAC ± 10%, PoE (802.3af) Power Consumption: Max. 12 W, Z/-H: Max. 13W Impact Protection: IEC60068-2-75Eh, 50J; EN50102, up to IK10 Ingress protection: IP66 IR Range: Up to 30m Dimensions: Φ 159.8 × 146 mm (Φ 6.29” × 5.75”) Weight: 2100 g (4.62 lbs)
onboardstorage: Micro SD/SDHC/SDXC card slot, up to 64 GB
imagesettings: Rotate mode, Saturation, Brightness, Contrast adjustable by client software or web browser
network: Network Storage: NAS Alarm Trigger: Intrusion detection, Defocus detection, Motion detection, Face detection, Dynamic analysis, Tampering alarm, Network disconnect, IP address conflict, Storage exception Protocols: TCP/IP,ICMP,HTTP,HTTPS,FTP,DHCP,DNS,DDNS,RTP,RTSP,RTCP, PPPoE,NTP,UPnP,SMTP,SNMP,IGMP,802.1X,QoS,IPv6,Bonjour (SIP optional) Security: User Authentication, Watermark, IP address filtering, anonymous access System Compatibility: ONVIF, PSIA, CGI
alarmtrigger: Intrusion detection, Defocus detection, Motion detection, Face detection, Dynamic analysis, Tampering alarm, Network disconnect, IP address conflict, Storage exception
camera: Image Sensor: 1/3" Progressive Scan CMOS Min. Illumination: 0.1 Lux @ (F1.2, AGC ON), 0.14 Lux @ (F1.4, AGC ON), 0 lux with IR Shutter time: 1 s to 1/100,000 s Lens: 2.8 ~ 12mm @F1.4, angle of view: 91.2° ~ 28.3° (-Z: motorized VF lens) Lens Mount: φ14 Auto Iris: DC drive Adjustment Range: Pan:0° - 355°, Tilt: 0° - 75°, Rotation: 0° - 355° Day& Night: ICR (Auto/Schedule/Alarm Trigger) Wide Dynamic Range: 120dB WDR Digital noise reduction: 3D DNR
